meanings.definition: To utter a long, mournful cry like that of a dog.
meanings.sent1: The lonely dog yowls at night.
meanings.sent2: The wolf yowls in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The wind yowls through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The singer yowls with emotion on stage.

meanings.definition: A long, mournful cry or howl.
meanings.sent1: The yowls of the coyote echoed in the canyon.
meanings.sent2: The yowls of the hound could be heard for miles.
meanings.sent3: The yowls of the baby kept the whole house awake.
meanings.sent4: The yowls of the wind made the night eerie.
meanings.sent5: The yowls of the singer captivated the audience.
